amendment.description: To permit the use of certain unobligated carryover funds to carry out the 911 access loan program.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2108 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 2108 proposed by Senator Bennett for Senator Burns. (consideration: CR S14009; text: CR S14009) To permit the use of certain unobligated carryover funds to carry out the 911 access loan program.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2108 proposed by Senator Bennett for Senator Burns.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2108 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
